name: Avirus
description:
Jump Into a Challenging Shooter / Platformer and attempt to Destroy the Virus within your Computer, You won't be alone as you have an AI to help Guide and Assist you in your Fight.

Notes

This Game was Created Within 1 Week as an Entry for Brackey's Game Jam!

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-8

Install Instructions

➤Download the Zip File Below

➤Open the File and Right click to Extract Files

➤Open the Extracted Files

➤Double Click on Avirus.exe

➤lol that's it. enjoy :0
